name: Spacious & Stylish 4 Bedrooms Apt
description:
Spacious & Stylish 4 Bedrooms Apt is situated in the Upper West Side district of New York, 800 metres from Central Park, 500 metres from Lincoln Center and 1 km from Strawberry Fields. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.2 km from Radio City Music Hall, 1.6 km from Rockefeller Center and 1.5 km from Top of the Rock. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from St Patrick's Cathedral.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Carnegie Hall, Broadway Theatre and Museum of Modern Art. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 12 km from Spacious & Stylish 4 Bedrooms Apt.

name: Trump International New York
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Trump International New York! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Trump International New YorkLocated at the juncture of Columbus Circle and Broadway, this 5-star hotel is minutes from Central Park. It features Jean Georges and Nougatine restaurants and the rooms provide kitchenette facilities.

Each spacious room at Trump International New York provides large windows with views of the city or Central Park. They are furnished with a 55-inch flat-screen cable TV and Blue-ray DVD players. The kitchenette offers a dining area and the bathrooms are decorated in marble.

Over 6,000 square feet is dedicated to the Trump Spa. The spa offers unique techniques from around the world with a selection of facials, massages and other treatments. It includes an indoor heated pool and health club with saunas and yoga classes.

New York Trump International is less than one mile from the Radio City Music Hall. Central Park Zoo is also one mile away and LaGuardia Airport is 10 miles from the hotel.

name: West Side YMCA
description:
Located 50 metres away from Central Park, this hostel is located on Manhattan’s Upper West Side, just 5 minutes’ walk from Columbus Circle. WiFi access is provided free of charge to guests.

A desk, a TV and air conditioning are provided in each room at West Side YMCA.  Linens and towels are included as well. All rooms have access to a shared bathroom down the hall.

A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to West Side YMCA. The property features a 65000 square-feet fitness centre that comes with a  sauna, steam room, weight-lifting and cardiovascular equipment  and 2 indoor swimming pools. There are several free weekly group exercise classes for guests as well. These classes are subject to availability.

Lincoln Center is just 300 metres from the hostel, while Carnegie Hall is 700 metres away. The American Museum of Natural History is 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Comfy Guest House by Columbus Circle
description:
Comfy Guest House by Columbus Circle is situated in the Central New York City district of New York, 300 metres from Carnegie Hall, less than 1 km from Radio City Music Hall and a 15-minute walk from Rockefeller Center. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 800 metres from Museum of Modern Art. The property is 400 metres from Broadway Theatre, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, an oven, a kettle, a bidet, a hair dryer and a desk. With a shared bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Comfy Guest House by Columbus Circle include Top of the Rock, St Patrick's Cathedral and Central Park. The nearest airport is New York Skyports Seaplane Base Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Nap York Central Park Sleep Station
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Nap York Central Park Sleep Station! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Nap York Central Park Sleep Station is situated conveniently in New York, and offers a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is set less than 1 km from Radio City Music Hall, a 15-minute walk from Rockefeller Center and 1.2 km from Top of the Rock. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

At the hostel, all rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Nap York Central Park Sleep Station include Broadway Theatre, Museum of Modern Art and Carnegie Hall. The nearest airport is LaGuardia Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Splendid 2 Bedroom apartment in NYC!
description:
Located in a central area of New York, 500 metres from Carnegie Hall, Splendid 2 Bedroom apartment in NYC! provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is situated 1.2 km from Strawberry Fields, 1.1 km from Radio City Music Hall and 1.5 km from Rockefeller Center. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Broadway Theatre.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of Modern Art, Central Park and Lincoln Center. The nearest airport is New York Skyports Seaplane Base Airport, 5 km from Splendid 2 Bedroom apartment in NYC!.

name: Mandarin Oriental, New York
description:
Located in Columbus Circle’s Deutsche Bank Center, this hotel is a 2-minute walk from Central Park. It features a 75-foot indoor pool and offers rooms and suites with panoramic views of Central Park, Manhattan skyline and Hudson River.

Every room at Mandarin Oriental, New York features floor-to-ceiling windows. Guests can enjoy the 55-inch flat-screen TV. A mini-bar is included and a chocolate and bottle of water are provided each day.

Mandarin Oriental, New York offers a full-service spa with a sauna and massage rooms. The hotel also provides an extensive on-site fitness center. New York City tourist information and ticket services are also available through the Concierge.

MO Lounge, located on site, serves contemporary American cuisine and well-crafted cocktails and has wall-to-wall views of Central Park and the Manhattan Skyline.

This hotel is within a 10-minute walk of shopping on Fifth Avenue and 350 metres from the Museum of Art and Design. The Museum of Modern Art is 1.1 km away.

name: Moderne Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Moderne Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
This modern hotel is located in Midtown Manhattan, 805 metres from Times Square and the Broadway Theater District. It features luxurious rooms with a 42-inch flat-screen TV.

The guestrooms at the Moderne Hotel feature beds with Belgian linens and down duvets. After a day of exploring the city, guests can relax and listen to the CD player. Free WiFi is available.

The Museum of Modern Art is 644 metres from the Moderne Hotel. Central Park is 483 metres away while the subway station is 161 metres away.

The front desk of this smoke-free hotel is open 24 hours a day.

name: Centrally located Manhattan apartments ,Times Square/Hell’s kitchen
description:
Located in New York, 600 metres from Carnegie Hall and 700 metres from Radio City Music Hall, Centrally located Manhattan apartments, Times Square/Hell’s kitchen offers air conditioning. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as St Patrick's Cathedral, Central Park, and Lincoln Center. The property is 200 metres from Broadway Theatre, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 3-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and microwave. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of Modern Art, Rockefeller Center and Top of the Rock. The nearest airport is New York Skyports Seaplane Base Airport, 4 km from Centrally located Manhattan apartments, Times Square/Hell’s kitchen.
